resources.string: Displays the current Gregorian and Jewish date and time.
Welcome to the Jewish Calendar Widget! To use it, please add it to your home screen.
If the button above doesn\'t work, long-press on your home screen, select \'Widgets\', and find \'Jewish Calendar Widget\'.
Request to add widget sent to launcher. Look for it on your home screen!
Failed to add widget. Please try manually.
Automatic widget adding not supported by your launcher. Please add manually.
Please add the widget manually from your home screen.
Long press on your home screen, select Widgets, and add the Jewish Calendar Widget
